LAGOSUS Data sources

Source: R/LAGOSUS-package.R
locus_source.Rd

LAGOSUS Data sources

Variable nameVariable descriptionUnits
source_codea short codename used for the source dataset in LAGOS-US variables or metadata
source_namethe name of the source dataset
source_shortnamethe abbreviated name used to refer to the source dataset in LAGOS-US documentation
source_descriptiona brief description of the source dataset
source_providerthe provider of the source dataset (government agency, publication citation, etc.)
source_citationthe citation for the source dataset, including the download link used to acquire the dataset at the time of LAGOS-US creation
source_urlThe principal website associated with the source dataset. This may not be the same as the download URL included in the citation.
source_metadata_urla website URL where metadata and data use guidance for the source dataset can be found
source_spatial_resolutionthe spatial resolution of the source dataset, if applicable
source_time_periodthe time period captured by the source dataset, if applicable
source_access_datethe date(s) the source dataset was acquired for use in creating LAGOS-US
source_data_typethe data value type contained in the source dataset, if applicable
